templates.title: Download Templates
templates.description: Use the official IEEE Conference Templates for your Paper submission.

guidelines.label: Submission Portal
guidelines.text: All papers must be submitted electronically through the EDAS conference submission portal. No other submission method is accepted.

guidelines.label: Language & File Format
guidelines.text: Submissions must be in English and formatted according to the IEEE conference template (A4 size). Submissions are only accepted in .doc, .docx, .pdf format.

guidelines.label: Originality
guidelines.text: Authors must submit original research papers that have not been published elsewhere or are currently under review by other journals or conferences.

guidelines.label: Plagiarism Policy
guidelines.text: Overall similarity rate must not exceed 30%, and similarity to a single source must not exceed 10% for IEEE Xplore submission.

review.label: Peer Review
review.text: All submitted papers will undergo a peer-review process by at least three independent reviewers following IEEE review guidelines.

review.label: Review Criteria
review.text: Key criteria include originality, technical quality, clarity, and relevance to the conference tracks.

review.label: Final Decision
review.text: The decision of the Technical Program Committee (TPC) Chair will be final.

review.label: Notification
review.text: Authors will receive an email notification regarding the acceptance or rejection of their paper.

publication.label: Presentation Required
publication.text: Accepted papers must be presented at the conference by one of the authors. Format (oral/poster) will be communicated upon acceptance.

publication.label: Registration
publication.text: At least one author must register at the full rate for the paper to be included in the proceedings.

publication.label: IEEE Xplore
publication.text: All accepted and presented papers will be submitted for inclusion in IEEE Xplore.

publication.label: Copyright
publication.text: Authors of accepted papers are required to complete and submit an electronic IEEE Copyright Form (eCF).
